text: John Bainbridge Webster DD FRSE (20 June 1955 - 25 May 2016) was a British theologian of the Anglican Communion. He was born in Mansfield, England. He wrote about systematic, historical and moral theology. He was the Chair of Divinity at St. Mary's College, University of St Andrews, Scotland. He died at his home in Aberdeen, Scotland on 25 May 2016 at the age of 60. ==References== ==Other websites== *Webster's webpage at the University of St. Andrews *Kantzer Lectures at the Henry Center *Webster at Frost's Scottish Who's Who *John Webster at Theopedia Category:1955 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Oxford Category:Alumni of the University of Cambridge Category:Church of England clergy Category:English theologians Category:Writers from Nottinghamshire Category:University of St Andrews
title: John Webster (British theologian)
